General.Name: Channel Well Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Channel Well Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the processing, manufacturing, and trading of power supply and electrical appliances worldwide. It offers PC and IPC power supply, industrial power supply, wireless charging transmitter and receiver, LED lighting driver/power, enclosed switching power, and open frame power products, as well as telecom power systems, wireless chargers/power banks, adapters, USB chargers, electric vehicle chargers, power cables/electronic wires, magnetic components, and heat sinks. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.222, Nankan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 338
